Hi: I get the following message when enter sudo -s: "administrator is not in the sudoers file.  This incident will be reported." but administrator is my only account, does anyone knows how to save my data?
boot to single user mode and add administrator to the admin group which should be in /etc/sudoers?
what is the single user mode?
it basicaly gives you root access, a livecd would work equally well
boot to livecd, mount the drive, edit /etc/sudoers ensure that the ownership on sudoers is correct, reboot
